name: Magnetic Pizze
description:
Hi !

The jam

The chosen horse was : Magnetic North !

The goal of this game is to feed the Cylinder at the north pole of the planet (rather big man or small planet, you choose).

Right Mouse Click + Drag -> Rotate the planet like a god

Left Mouse Click + Drag -> Control the pizza you've clicked on ! 

CREDITS:

Background Music -> https://beta.aiva.ai/ (AI generated music)

All the "assets" / programming -> me :)

Things i wish i could have done, but didn't had time:

- Make some true Italian at the north pole

- Make some better looking cylinder

- Make a better planet
